snippet.title: Linguist FPS [Learn Japanese, Russian, French, Polish, Ukrainian & more] - OUT NOW
snippet.description:
Available now for Windows PC through STEAM: 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1945590/

Learn a new language with this fast paced action shooter! Follow instructions in your target language to unlock weapons and equipment upgrades. Use your new found language skills to save the city from an army of killer robots! Learn Japanese, French, Spanish, Russian and much more.

Current languages available to learn:
-Spanish (Latin American and European)
-French
-German
-Japanese (Kana, Kanji , Romaji)
-Russian
-Ukrainian
-Portuguese
-Italian
-Korean
-Chinese Mandarin (Simplified)
-Polish
-Swedish
-English (US, UK, Australian)
